#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{
int i=0;
char s[7];
gets(s);
while(s[i]!='\0')
{
if(s[i]=='1')
printf("%s","pa");
if(s[i]=='2')

printf("%s","re");
if(s[i]=='3')

printf("%s","ci");
if(s[i]=='4')

printf("%s","vo");
if(s[i]=='5')

printf("%s","mk");
if(s[i]=='6')

printf("%s","x");
if(s[i]=='7')

printf("%s","zi");
if(s[i]=='8')

printf("%s","bi");
if(s[i]=='9')

printf("%s","so");
 i++;

}
return 0;
}
